# Read in the data

```{r}
gdw <- read_csv(here("data", "gdw.csv"), na = c("", "NA"))

gdw <- gdw %>%  clean_names()
```

```{r}
gdw_10 <- head(gdw, 10) #extract the first ten rows of the dataset
```

```{r}
kable(gdw_10)
```

```{r}
print(colnames(gdw))
print(dim(gdw))
```
```{r}
gdw %>% group_by('dam_type') %>% 
  summarise(num_dam = count(na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  ungroup()
```

```{r}
sub_dam <- gdw %>% filter(dam_type == "Dam")
```

```{r}
gdw %>% arrange(year_txt)
```

```{r}
gdw_bar <- gdw %>% group_by(country) %>% 
  summarise(avg_dam_hgt_m = round(mean(dam_hgt_m, na.rm = TRUE), 2))
```

```{r}
ggplot(gdw_bar, aes(x = country)) +
  geom_bar()
```
